My chapter on SceneJS for OpenGL Insights is now free to download!

Lindsay Kay / 3D Web Software Engineer


I’m a 3D graphics software engineer developing browser-based visualization solutions for engineering, BIM, architecture and medicine.

Originally from Christchurch, New Zealand, I’ve lived in Berlin, Germany since 2011. I graduated with a degree in computer science from the University of Canterbury in 2005.

Some projects I’ve worked on:

  • Browser-based 3D tech within BioDigital Human, OpenProject 10.4, BIMData, plus a few others
  • Open source 3D Web programming toolkits: xeokit, xeogl and SceneJS
  • Contributing author on OpenGL Insights


For more projects, please check out my portfolio, resume and LinkedIn profile.
